description: There is a workaround in nova-manage image convert to move images to images_bak if you specify the same directory that the local image service is working with.  Unfortunately it uses os.move() which is actually os.rename().
title: nova-manage image convert fails if image directory is specified

comments.content: There is a workaround in nova-manage image convert to move images to images_bak if you specify the same directory that the local image service is working with.  Unfortunately it uses os.move() which is actually os.rename().
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
